meanings.definition: A drug used to prevent or treat malaria.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antimalarials to help cure the disease.
meanings.sent2: She always carries antimalarials when traveling to tropical regions.
meanings.sent3: The antimalarials worked like magic, keeping the mosquitoes away.
meanings.sent4: His backpack was a treasure chest of antimalarials, protecting him from the invisible enemy.
meanings.sent5: The bright packaging of the antimalarials caught her eye, a beacon of hope in a tiny pill.

meanings.definition: Relating to the prevention or treatment of malaria.
meanings.sent1: The antimalarials campaign aimed to educate people about the importance of prevention.
meanings.sent2: The antimalarials research team made significant progress in finding new treatments.
meanings.sent3: The antimalarials warning signs were posted all over the village, reminding everyone to stay safe.
